= Small How-To =

To get the USB Loader working you need to follow a few rules.

-cover images need a resolution of *160x224* and must be place in *SDRoot:/images/*

-DVD covers image need a resolution of *160x160* and must be placed in *SDRoot:/images/disc/*

-DVD and Boxart images must both named like this RUU.png for example so only the first 3 characters of the GameID.
